pullRequest.title: Fix bugs from 100.8 regressions testing
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR includes an enhancement for the viewshed samples and fixes some bugs from 100.8 regression testing:

Removes the colour picker from Viewshed (location) sample and explicitly sets the colours of the visible, obstructed areas and frustum outline. This prevents the changes from the color picker from effecting the other viewshed samples in the sample viewer.
Removes the unclickable duplicate cell from the transformations list in List transformations by suitability sample.
Adds CSS colours to the labels in Control annotation sublayer visibility. Previously in the sample viewer, if you hovered over the open sublayer checkbox label when out of scale, it would switch from gray to white.

Thanks!
@JonLavi

nodes.bodyText:
Good solution to the issue, to just go ahead and simplify it 👍
We only need to update the screenshot to use the colours that we're setting here.
Good spot on this, it was quite a sneaky bug!
